## Description {#details}

This file implements a virtual register coloring pass.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> doesn&#39;t have a fixed number of registers, but it is still desirable to minimize the total number of registers used in each function.

This code is modeled after <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/stackslotcoloring-cpp">lib/CodeGen/StackSlotColoring.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same. Note that RegMapIt-&gt;second, the vector of &#123;SlotIndex,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LastUndefResult = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &#42;OtherLI : CoalescedIntervals) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI == OtherLI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This DBG&#95;VALUE has &#39;Reg&#39; (the current LiveInterval&#39;s register) as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its operand. If this DBG&#95;VALUE&#39;s slot index is within other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers&#39; live ranges, this DBG&#95;VALUE should be undefed. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, suppose %0 and %1 are to be coalesced into %0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; %0&#39;s live range starts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = value&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   DBG&#95;VALUE %0, !&quot;a&quot;, ...      (a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   DBG&#95;VALUE %1, !&quot;b&quot;, ...      (b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; %0&#39;s live range ends</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; %1&#39;s live range starts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = value&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   DBG&#95;VALUE %0, !&quot;c&quot;, ...      (c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   DBG&#95;VALUE %1, !&quot;d&quot;, ...      (d)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   use %1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; %1&#39;s live range ends</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this code, (b) and (c) should be set to undef. After the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers are coalesced, (b) will incorrectly say the variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;b&quot;&#39;s value is &#39;value&#95;0&#39;, and (c) will also incorrectly say the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variable &quot;c&quot;&#39;s value is value&#95;1. Note it doesn&#39;t actually matter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which register they are coalesced into (%0 or %1); (b) and (c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be set to undef as well if they are coalesced into %1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This happens DBG&#95;VALUEs are not included when computing live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that it is not possible for this DBG&#95;VALUE to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simultaneously within &#39;Reg&#39;&#39;s live range and one of other coalesced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers&#39; live ranges because if their live ranges overlapped they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would have not been selected as a coalescing candidate in the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SegmentIt = OtherLI-&gt;find(Slot);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SegmentIt != OtherLI-&gt;end() &amp;&amp; SegmentIt-&gt;contains(Slot)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Undefed: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
